text: For prophylaxis for transurethral resection of the prostate, in the absence of culture and susceptibility test results, use: gentamicin 2 mg/kg intravenously over 3 to 5 minutes, within the 120 minutes before the procedure [Note 47] ; intraoperative redosing is unlikely to be required (see here ). Do not give additional doses once the procedure is completed. o) Ã© F
